sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { environment } from '../../../environments/environment'; @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login.component.css'] }) export class LoginComponent { public apikey: string = "" public link: string = "" login() { const url = environment.apiFootbal.url; const token = environment.apiFootbal.token; console.log(`URL: ${url}`); console.log(`Token: ${token}`); } }

Para acessar digite sua apikey e link api
